name: Democratic_Process
description:
• Democratic Process is a two-player competitive strategy card game.
  • The game is about being a president candidate to beat your opponent candidate in the election.
  • The game focus on how the players manage their resources to gain more support.
  • The game contain three different types of cards, President Candidate card, advisor card and strategy card.
  • The game ends in twenty rounds.

 Online Gameplay link is here: https://tabletopia.com/playground/democratic-process-45b3f3/play-now
